item.title: So long, 2011… Looking forward to 2012…
item.description:
A beautiful sunset at Khadakwasla, Pune

New Year’s Eve… Fond memories of a great 2011… As we wait to roll in the new year, 2012, I wish you and your loved ones a joyous year ahead. Good health, good cheer and a Happy New Year!
